You may not like this app if you have many "notes/pencils" and want to play a game.  They can get in the way.  Two areas of improvement.  1. If you could colour the pencils. In this way I could colour code the pencils as to their importance. 2. It would be nice if you could select screens where the notes will not appear.  I gave the app five stars because of what it does, not what I would like it to do.

Preserve note color after they are saved (by clicking notification) and then restored. Right now, the colors can be different than what the note was.  2. Allow option to have user set note color on a per note basis.  3. Trash Bin functionality would be really nice so that deleted notes can be accessed historically.  Obviously, there needs to be some limit to trash can size and too many notes can slow things down a lot (as I know from my desktop sticky note application).
